com.alpineclient.plugin.api.objects

Class Notification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.alpineclient.plugin.api.objects.Notification

  • public final class Notification
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an object that displays a toast popup on the user's screen.
    Since:
    1.0.0
